main event: A round object, the size of a silver dollar, with red and white alternating colors, was observed in the sky for 15 minutes before it suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The object was observed at a course heading southwest., The observation took place at night using binoculars with standard GOC issue power., The object was very bright and alternated colors abruptly and unevenly., The sighting was reported by a civilian observer from Odebolt, Iowa., Wind conditions at different altitudes did not coincide with the object's movement.
sighted object: One round object in the sky
witness description: Mrs. (32, housewife), Mr. (33, electrician), Mr. (34, barber) - all from Odebolt, Iowa
